author: pronichkin
body:
Right now it appears that [Python has an advantage](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/python/python-in-the-windows-10-may-2019-update/) over PowerShell (Core) because:

- Python is published to Windows Store
- You can open deep link to the store natively by typing "python" in cmd

PowerShell (Core) currently has neither of these benefits. This is upsetting—especially if we want to eventually displace Windows PowerShell with it.

Publishing to Windows Store would also aid frequent automatic updates, which is important for the Betas, I suppose.
